scripts.dev: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next dev
scripts.build: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next build
scripts.start: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next start
scripts.install-python-deps: pip install moviepy transformers gtts requests torch || pip3 install moviepy transformers gtts requests torch
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Python dependencies installed automatically on npm run dev/build/start. Manual install: pip install moviepy transformers gtts requests torch'
